description:
This "Facebook Graph Search" Course is all about Learning How to Search on Facebook!

If you're NEW to Facebook, or you want simply to learn about Facebook Search, feel free to enroll in the course as it is officially FREE!

We've covered:

  • How to Find People from Howard University!?
  • How to Find [Only] Men from Howard University!?
  • How to Find [Only] Women from Howard University!?
  • How to Find [Only] Men from Your City!?
  • How to Find [Only] Women from Your City!?
  • How to Find [Only] Friends from Your City!?
  • How to Find People from Your Country!?
  • How to Find [Only] Men from Your Country!?
  • How to Find [Only] Women from Your Country!?
  • How to Find [Only] Friends from Your Country!?
  • How to Find People from Your Company!?
  • How to Find [Only] Friends from Your Company!?
  • How to Find [Only] Men and Women from Your Company!?
  • How to Find Pages!? - BONUS
  • How to Find Groups!? - BONUS
  • How to Find Your Old Posts!? - BONUS
  • How to Find Your Friends' Old Posts!? - BONUS
  • How to Find Answers of Your Questions!? - BONUS
title: Facebook Graph Search: Learn How to Search on Facebook!
